meta.name: yugioh_anime_layout
notes: All rects are expressed as x,y,w,h in 0..1 relative to the full canvas.
Draw order: artwork (clipped to artworkArea) -> layout (full size) -> stars -> attributeIcon -> atkValue -> defValue
The layout PNG is drawn at 100% size, artwork is clipped to fit inside the gray frame area.
Layout has transparent area where artwork shows through.

elements.notes: Area where artwork is drawn, clipped to this rectangle. Matches the transparent area of the layout PNG.
Card artwork clipped to artworkArea, drawn BEFORE the layout
Layout PNG drawn at 100% covering entire canvas. Has transparency where artwork shows.
Level stars centered in the stats strip, just below the artwork frame
Circular attribute icon (DARK, LIGHT, etc.) to the right of stars
ATK value text, positioned inside the left stat box of the layout
DEF value text, positioned inside the right stat box of the layout
